title: Research Articles Moved to Multilingual System
abstract: Research articles are now integrated within the multilingual habit system and served via the content API.
summary: The research articles database has been consolidated into the new multilingual content management system. All research is now embedded within habit data for better integration.
keyFindings: Research is integrated with habit effectiveness rankings
All studies include quantified benefits and effect sizes
practicalTips: Research citations embedded in habit translations
Use content API for latest research data
migrationNote: Legacy research articles archived. New system provides integrated research within multilingual habit content.
